facts.fact: The README.md file of the Kaspa Improvement Proposals (KIPs) repository has been updated to add previously missing details about the submission process and to improve the formatting.
facts.context: This change increases the clarity and accessibility of governance documentation, supporting better community understanding and participation in protocol improvements.

governance.fact: The README.md file of the Kaspa Improvement Proposals (KIPs) repository has been updated to add previously missing details about the submission process and to improve the formatting.
governance.context: This change increases the clarity and accessibility of governance documentation, supporting better community understanding and participation in protocol improvements.
